tokens.text: checks for deprecated features, blocks, and textures

title: Deprecated Features
description: Checks for deprecated features, blocks, and textures that may be removed in future Minecraft versions. Update deprecated content to ensure long-term compatibility.

fields.title: Deprecated Block
fields.description: Warning when overriding a deprecated vanilla block. The block may be removed in future versions, breaking your content.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the deprecated block identifier

fields.title: Deprecated Terrain
fields.description: Warning when referencing a deprecated terrain texture name. Update to the current texture identifier.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the deprecated terrain texture name

fields.title: Deprecated Texture
fields.description: Warning when using a deprecated texture path. Update to the current texture location.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the deprecated texture path

fields.title: JSON Parse Error
fields.description: Error when a JSON file could not be parsed during deprecation checking.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the JSON parse error message
